EmailTemplate.name: SM-2018-11-Which Cloud EMEA.Email - Invite 1a EMEA Send.ES 1 - HTML Invite 1
EmailTemplate.subject: £5 Starbucks Voucher for 3 Minute Survey | Which Cloud Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://bit.ly/2T9BmxI]]> Take Survey and Earn £5 Starbucks Voucher <[[http://bit.ly/2T9BmxI]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
When it comes down to cloud providers, which should you choose? It should be a straightforward question, but when you need a detailed justification for the CIO, the CFO, and the board, you need more than just a hunch.
Let's find out together. Take our NEW Which Cloud Survey <[[http://bit.ly/2T9BmxI]]> to help establish a baseline on where organizations like yours are in their public cloud journeys and identify which cloud providers are winning in the race towards adoption.
Take Survey Now <[[http://bit.ly/2T9BmxI]]>
This survey will take approximately 3 minutes to complete. As a thank you for your time, you will earn a free coffee with a £5 Starbucks voucher upon completion of the survey.
Regards, Megan
